attributes.review: This app took so long to download like what was even the reason. Just don’t waist your time trying to download it it takes forever like a week or two. Just take down the app at this point✨🧚🏿‍♀️✨
attributes.title: The worst app ever

attributes.review: The app takes awhile to load, there was random times it closed, and the glitches are terrible!! Super disappointed!!
attributes.title: slow, glitches, & app closes randomly

attributes.review: This app made my phone do a backflip off the ifle tower, where it then bounced into the Atlantic ocean ,swam to the Antarctic ,got eaten by a polar bear ,got digested ,hopped into a Valcano and floated into space. I wish I never downloaded it I haven’t seen my phone since rip 🥺😭
attributes.title: The story that led to my phones death 🙄🌈

attributes.review:
I downloaded this and everyone in my family left me or died, my cat committed toaster bath and now I’m all alone, the rats come every night to my house to calm me down but this app has haunted me ever since

sincerely, anonymous 

P.S I hate the president💗
attributes.title: worst app to ever be made on this planet

attributes.review: This app is a danger to society and spreads fake news that can manipulate people into thinking very dangerous and harmful things towards minorities and parties that don’t support white supremacy. This app is supporting terrorism and acts as a resource for racism, homophobia, xenophobia, transphobia, and is a platform for white supremacy
attributes.title: The WORST app I have downloaded

attributes.review: This app is really bad it doesn't give useful information about Donald Trump and his purposes and it’s so confused is to many things popping on the screen at the same time that I couldn’t read anything😡😡😡
attributes.title: The worst app ever

attributes.review: It took a long time to download and I was just trying to support our lovely ❤️❤️Oompa Loompa in office. It was very glitchy and hard to use I’ve never been so disappointed with an app. I do not recommend even for skeezy Cheeto supporters😤
attributes.title: Horrible 😭

attributes.review: it made my phone shut down and i couldn’t turn it back on. the next day, it suddenly turned on again but IT TURNED INTO A SAMSUNG. i don’t really know how that happened, but i had to get a new phone. thanks a lot. 😡
attributes.title: Worst app ever.

attributes.review: When I downloaded the app my wallpaper turned into a orange with a trump body then when I opened the app it started to glitch REALLY bad and then my phone shut down I had to restart my phone and delete the app
attributes.title: Do NOT download

attributes.review: Everything on this app is just overall TERRIBLE. Full of bugs, false information, and there’s nothing on there to do. It’s a waste of storage that you could be using for far more useful things!
attributes.title: Worst App Ever
